room_title: Escape room "Contagion" by Idaho Escape Rooms in Idaho Falls
room_description: A mad scientist has created a virus and released it on the world. The cure to this deadly new disease can be made from the original virus strain, but there's one problem... we don't know where he's hidden the original virus! You only have 60 minutes before the virus has spread too far to save mankind! See if you can decipher the mad scientist's trail of cryptic clues to find the deadly virus... before it's too late.
